attributes.action: Stop paying members of the Northern Ireland Assembley if they refuse to meet.
attributes.background: All members of the Northern Ireland assembley should have their wages stopped if they refuse to meet and do the job the public are paying them to do, this money can then be put to health and educational needs.

rejection.details:
The salaries of MLAs are determined by the Independent Financial Review Panel. You can find out more about the IFRP here:

http://ifrp.org.uk/
